items.sentence: Tax season is a very busy time of year for accountants.
Do you have a problem with me going to Boston with Tom?
Do you have any idea who else might want to go with us?
Tom doesn\'t think that would be the right thing to do.
When we started out, there were things we didn\'t know.
Tom helped the old lady carry her groceries to her car.
I thought Tom was asleep, so I tiptoed out of the room.
I thought it was really nice of you to do that for Tom.
This morning Tom said his sister was still sick in bed.
Tom agreed to the license agreement without reading it.
Tom and Mary invited us to spend the weekend with them.
Tom and his brother are very different from each other.
Tom picked up the ball and then threw it up in the air.
The man on the phone identified himself as Tom Jackson.
Tom bought a really expensive, well-made pair of shoes.
If you fail this class, you won\'t be able to graduate.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t going to be at school today.
I wasn\'t allowed to tell Tom what was going to happen.
Is that white car in front of my house Tom\'s or yours?
I got a job as a waiter at a restaurant on Park Street.
